name: Thomas W. INGRAM, Appellant, v. Joseph ROBBINS and Barbara Robbins and Robbins Transport

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY and CASTILLE, JJ.
parties: Thomas W. INGRAM, Appellant, v. Joseph ROBBINS and Barbara Robbins and Robbins Transport.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Gary R. Block, West Chester, Hannah Gardner, Bala Cyn-wyd, for Thomas W. Ingram.
Hugh A. Donaghue, Media, for Joseph and Barbara Robbins.
casebody.head_matter:
669 A.2d 930
Thomas W. INGRAM, Appellant, v. Joseph ROBBINS and Barbara Robbins and Robbins Transport.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 5, 1995.
Decided Dec. 29, 1995.
Gary R. Block, West Chester, Hannah Gardner, Bala Cyn-wyd, for Thomas W. Ingram.
Hugh A. Donaghue, Media, for Joseph and Barbara Robbins.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, CAPPY and CASTILLE, JJ.
